Title: Authorizes the governor to fill vacancy in the office of lieutenant-governor on confirmation of both houses of the legislature
Summary: Authorizes the governor to fill vacancy in the office of lieutenant-governor on confirmation of both houses of the legislature; allows the governor to leave the state without transmitting power to lieutenant-governor and establishes the process for lieutenant-governor to act as governor during incapacitation of the governor.
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing amendments to sections 5 and 6 of article 4 of the constitution, relating to the filling of vacancies in the office of lieutenant-governor and the powers and duties of such office
